attributes.action: Bruges Group paper proposes that Britain leave the EU and join EFTA instead
attributes.additional_details:
The majority of people in the UK are sick to their back teeth with the amount of money we contribute to the EU and the laws we seem to have to follow blindly!
It makes sense for Britain to leave the EU and join the EFTA just as we were members before we were stupidly and blindly lead into the European Union!
